Eric Schmidt said the results marked a terrific end to a stellar year for Google. His comments were among the last he made as CEO of the search firm, with Google announcing that co-founder Larry Page would step into Eric Schmidt 's shoes as CEO, while Eric Schmidt becomes executive chairman.
